publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-838.1 Bill Aitken: Asylum and Immigration (Treatment of Claimants, etc.) Bill - UK Legislation-As an amendment to motion (S2M-838) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "agrees that the provisions in the Asylum and Immigration (Treatment of Claimants, etc.) Bill which relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament."
S2M-838.1 Asylum and Immigration (Treatment of Claimants, etc.) Bill - UK Legislation (lodged on 10 February 2004) Phil Gallie*
